aboutSlider.title: 프로젝트 1단계
aboutSlider.text: We carry out a series of projects through architecture and space. The project is carried out by the team members to ensure that the building blends with the surrounding landscape and meets the needs of the customers. Share a series of professional deployment processes with clients
aboutSlider.alt: 직원들이 회의실에서 프로젝트 관련 회의하는 사진

aboutSlider.title: 프로젝트 2단계
aboutSlider.text: Communicate with the customer and create specific plans. During the design phase, we propose plans to meet the construction budget, and prioritize popular designs that the majority can relate to where profitability is required.
aboutSlider.alt: 직원이 건축 설계도를 그리고 있는 사진

aboutSlider.title: 프로젝트 3단계
aboutSlider.text: Based on the final design drawing, the architecture model is created through 3d modeling

aboutSlider.title: 프로젝트 4단계
aboutSlider.text: Architecture and space design are not boring over time by taking advantage of the efficiency of space composition and simplicity that prioritizes the beauty of the nature of the material.
